content: 19-21 3 sl 6 single_crochet 6 half_double_crochet 6 single_crochet 3 sl= 24 22 increase 9 single_crochet decrease x 2 9 single_crochet increase= 24 23 single_crochet in each st around 24 7 single_crochet increase x 3= 27 25 3 sl 7 single_crochet 7 half_double_crochet 7 single_crochet 3 sl= 27 26 8 single_crochet increase x 3= 30 27-31 6 sl 6 single_crochet 6 half_double_crochet 6 single_crochet 6 sl= 30 32 9 single_crochet chain 12 skip 12 stitches and connect your chain with a single_crochet to the next stitch 8 single_crochet sweet oddity art 3 head and body continued you are going to start working on the head continue crocheting around and work on the back bumps of the chain 1 4 single_crochet increase x 6= 36 2 5 single_crochet increase x 6= 42 3 6 single_crochet increase x 6= 48 sweet oddity art 4 4-11 single_crochet in each st around 12 15 single_crochet increase x 3= 51 13 single_crochet in each st around 14 increase 16 x 3= 54 stop working and you will close the hole on top of the head you can choose to close this later but i close it now because i am going to start stuffing the head attach color a yarn to a stitch on the top of the head tip 1 2 single_crochet decrease x 6= 18 2 single_crochet decrease x 6= 12 3 decrease x 6= 6 f/o and sew the hole closed sweet oddity art 5 place a stitch marker on the 1st increase and last increase of round 15 sweet oddity art 6 do not stuff the tip of the head when you are stuffing your head pinch the tip closed to keep the stuffing from navigating to the tip 15 increase x 3 32 single_crochet increase x 3 16 single_crochet= 60 16 increase 9 single_crochet x 6= 66 17-18 single_crochet in each st around 19 decrease 9 single_crochet x 6= 60 20 decrease 3 single_crochet x 12= 48 21 single_crochet in each st around 22 decrease 6 x 6= 42 23 decrease x 3 21 single_crochet decrease x 3 9 single_crochet= 36 tip you may have to adjust the eye placement depending on yarn and hook size you use place your eyes between rounds 11 and 12 place the 1st eye before the 1st increase where you placed your first stitch marker one hole before that stitch marker count 11 holes after that eye and place the 2nd after the last increase stuff the head well cut a long piece of yarn and remove the eyes place the needle in the hole where the first eye was and thread the needle into a hole next to the eye hole go back and forth between each eye hole repeating the process from the first eye pull slightly on the yarn after going through each hole do this about 3 times on each side until you reach the look you want follow the pictures for help there is also a youtube video i
